plot: 'To cook food is to place your heart on a plate,' states Los Angeles-based chef Christian Navarro. In this micro-documentary, this inked-and-pierced culinary artist reflects on what it means to serve those around him.
title: People & Plates
plot_es: 'To cook food is to place your heart on a plate,' states Los Angeles-based chef Christian Navarro. In this micro-documentary, this inked-and-pierced culinary artist reflects on what it means to serve those around him.
plot_en: 'To cook food is to place your heart on a plate,' states Los Angeles-based chef Christian Navarro. In this micro-documentary, this inked-and-pierced culinary artist reflects on what it means to serve those around him.
